Row.Text: My, isn't this a pleasant surprise - what may I call you, oh mysterious stranger? I am Theodora, beloved of Byzantium.
I am Theodora, mistress of all the world's wonders and beauties. Impress me, stranger, and I may find you a fitting addition to my collection.
Although I have many admirers, you are among the most esteemed of my guests. You may call me Theodora, favored Empress of Byzantium.
I like to see a little backbone in a person. It's very encouraging.
I have underestimated you. I find that ... exciting.
Never mind. You will not always be so impervious to my charms.
I'd say that was quite enjoyable, wouldn't you agree? I do ever so much love winning.
I hope you've learned your lesson. I do dislike having to punish you so much.
You may have won this round, but I wonder if you truly yet understand the game ...
Tsk, life is boring if you always win. Let's see what you do with this small opportunity.
The winds of change bring a frost which kills the delicate flower. You have destroyed what this nation held most dear.
Like a child playing with toys you are. My people will never love you, nor suffer this indignation gracefully.
When the sun rises again it will weep for what it sees. The lifeblood of this civilization flows within me, and I am no more.
Greetings, dear.
Hello again.
Farewell.
Goodbye.
We are agreed.
I am intrigued by your honeyed words, but I will need to hear more.
Can you do a little better?
That's not quite good enough.
Almost ...
I am not interested.
You amuse me. I see no reason to deny you this.
My, you think yourself more important than you truly are. I think not.
I have heard that you adept at certain kinds of ... interactions. Show me.
All of my suitors and courtiers are expected to grace my presence with gifts.
But of course.
Very well then.
I must refuse.
Sadly, no.
Yes?
Go ahead.
Welcome back.
Darling!
Until we meet again.
Farewell, dearest.
Agreed.
Hmm ... I was too busy listening to your sonorous voice. Try that again.
Is that the best you can do?
Almost, kitten.
Thank you, but not this time.
My, aren't you the forward one. Perhaps you do deserve to be rewarded.
Alas, I have nothing of this kind to offer you. Would you take something ... else in return?
Darling, where's my gift? You always bring one when you visit.
Perhaps you would like to share in other activities as well.
Of course, darling.
Certainly not.
That's unacceptable.
Yes, darling?
I'm listening.
Well?
What do you want?
That is all.
Remove yourself.
Fine. Agreed.
Tsk. I find your antics tiresome. Improve your offer or go away.
That's not good enough.
You must do better than that.
Almost ...
No more. I will not suffer your presence any longer.
It galls me that I must agree to this ridiculousness.
You forget you are no longer in favor. A thousand times no.
If I must submit myself to your foolishness, I expect it to be made worthwhile.
I hope you disagree, so that I may offer this to more worthy individuals.
Very well.
Of course not.
That's unacceptable.
You cannot be serious!
Out with it.
You have preyed upon my delicate senses. I would wallow in sorrow, but I think I shall find greater pleasure in destroying you.
It is always a shame to destroy a thing of beauty. Happily, you are not one.
You don't return my gifts, and my messengers come back empty handed. I have come for that which is mine, with force.
Your true colors are shown at last. How dare you think you can do this to me?
Now darling, tantrums are most unbecoming. I shall have to teach you a lesson.
What, did you think you were the only suitor? Many will come to my aid - you are only one.
